                                      28        IHBCOB                                                           00224021
                                      29+*     THIS IS A MACRO GENERATING COBOL COMMON AS A DSECT USED
                                      30+*      BY EVERY PHASE OF THE COBOL COMPILER
                                      31+*
                                      32+***********************************************************************
                                      33+*      COMMON - THE COMMUNICATIONS AREA
                                      34+***********************************************************************
                                      35+*      THIS TABLE IS LOCATED IN PH0 FOLLOWING THE ENTRY POINT- COS.
                                      36+*      AT ENTRY TO EACH PHASE R1 POINTS TO THE SLOT CONTAINING COSADDR.

0000000                              244 IKF501   CSECT                                                          00232021
                             00000   245 COMON1 EQU   *                                                          00240021
                                     246 *                                      THE FOLLOWING FIELDS ARE FOR     00248021
                                     247 *                                      IDENTIFICATION PURPOSES ONLY     00256021
 000000 C9D2C6C3C2D3F5F0             248          DC    C'IKFCBL50'             X                                00264021
 000008 C2                           249          DC    C'B'                    X                                00272021

1         PHASE 5 - A BRIEF DESCRIPTION                                                                         PAGE    8
-  LOC  OBJECT CODE    ADDR1 ADDR2  STMT   SOURCE STATEMENT                                       ASM 0201 11.03 02/14/15
0                                    252 *=1       PH5 C O N T R O L .                                           00296021
                                     253 *=3                                                                     00304021
                                     254 *TITLE 'PH5     '                                                       00312021
                                     255 *STATUS: CHANGE LEVEL 000                                               00320021
                                     256 *FUNCTION/OPERATION: OBTAIN IC TEXT FROM 'PH4     ' AND CONVERT IT      00328021
                                     257 *   A-TEXT ACCEPTABLE TO 'PH6     '.                                    00336021
                                     258 *            ORGANIZATION OF PHASE...                                   00344021
                                     259 *              PH5CTL PHASE 5 CONTROL. OBTAINS IC-TEXT AND PROCESSE     00352021
                                     260 *                     ALL BUT VERB-STRINGS WHICH ARE ROUTED TO PROP     00360021
                                     261 *                     VERB ANALYZERS.                                   00368021
                                     262 *              A-TEXT GENERATOR. HAS ENTRY POINTS FOR MOST MACHINE      00376021
                                     263 *                     INSTRUCTIONS AND BUILDS A-TEXT (PROCEDURE AND     00384021
                                     264 *                     OPTIMIZATION) BASED UPON VARIOUS PARAMETERS       00392021
                                     265 *                     PROVIDED IT BY THE CALLING ANALYZER OR SUBRTN     00400021
                                     266 *                     SUPPLEMENTAL TO THIS PORTION IS                   00408021
                                     267 *                     THE DIRECT-PROCEDURE-A-TEXT GENERATOR,            00416021
                                     268 *                     A SUBROUTINE.                                     00424021
                                     269 *              VERB-ANALYZERS. SEPERATE ANALYZERS OBTAIN STRINGS FO     00432021
                                     270 *                     THEIR PARTICULAR VERBS AND GENERATES A-TEXT       00440021
                                     271 *                     REPRESENTING OBJECT CODE FOR THE STATEMENT.       00448021
                                     272 *              SUBROUTINES. NUMEROUS SERVICE SUBROUTINES SUPPORT        00456021
                                     273 *                     ALL OTHER PARTS OF THE PHASE.                     00464021
                                     274 *              SUBSCRIPTS AND SUBSCRIPT REGISTER ALLOCATION ARE HAN     00472021
                                     275 *                     BY SEVERAL SUBROUTINES AND ANALYZERS.             00480021
                                     276 *              TAMER TABLE AND COMMON ARE COMMUNICATION REGIONS IN      00488021
                                     277 *                     MAIN-STORAGE THAT ARE USED FOR INTER-PHASE        00496021
                                     278 *                     INFORMATION-PASSING, AND ARE NOT PART OF PHAS     00504021
-
                                     280 *ENTRY POINTS:                                                          00520021
                                     281 *        'PH5     ' MAIN ENTRY POINT, CALLED BY 'PH0     '.             00528021
                                     282 *INPUT:              IC-TEXT   SYSUT2                                   00536021
                                     283 *                     COMMON    MAIN-STORAGE                            00544021
                                     284 *OUTPUT:             PROCEDURE A-TEXT   SYSUT1                          00552021
                                     285 *                     OPTIMIZATION A-TEXT SYSUT3                        00560021
                                     286 *                     E-TEXT (ERR MESG'S) SYSUT4                        00568021
                                     287 *                     COMMON              MAIN-STORAGE                  00576021
                                     288 *                     TABLE: PNUTBL       MAIN-STORAGE (TAMER)          00584021
                                     289 *EXTERNAL ROUTINES:                                                     00592021
                                     290 *        'PH0     '   CALLS THIS PHASE AND PROVIDES I/O, COMMON + T     00600021
                                     291 *                     SUPPORT.                                          00608021
                                     292 *EXITS-NORMAL:  N/A                                                     00616021
                                     293 *EXITS-ERROR:   N/A                                                     00624021
                                     294 *TABLES/WORK AREAS:    ... THOSE ITEMS THAT ARE VARIABLE OR MIXED       00632021
                                     295 *                          CONSTANT-VARIABLE ARE COLLECTED TOGETHER     00640021
                                     296 *                          IN AN AREA UNDER BASE REG XRDATA.            00648021
                                     297 *                      ... THOSE ITEMS THAT ARE NON-INSTRUCTIONS AN     00656021
                                     298 *                          FULLY CONSTANTS ARE COLLECTED UNDER BASE     00664021
                                     299 *                          REG XRCONS.                                  00672021
                                     300 *                                                                       00680021
                                     301 *ATTRIBUTES: NON-REUSABLE (DUE TO SOME NON-INITIALIZED SWITCHES).       00688021
                                     302 *NOTES: N/A                                                             00696021
1         PH5CTL - PHASE 5 CONTROL ROUTINE                                                                      PAGE    9
-  LOC  OBJECT CODE    ADDR1 ADDR2  STMT   SOURCE STATEMENT                                       ASM 0201 11.03 02/14/15
0                            00000   304        USING   COMON1,XRBAS1                                            00712021
                             00E30   305        USING   COMON2,RB1                                               00720021
                             01690   306        USING   COMON3,GBRG1                                             00728021
                             07590   307        USING   COMON4,XRCONS                                            00736021
                             080C8   308        USING   COMON5,XRDATA                                            00744021
                             00000   309        USING COS,XRBAS2                                                 00752021
                                     310 *                             PH5CTL                                    00760021
                                     311 *******************************************************************     00768021
                                     312 * CHECKS THE INPUT OF PHASE 5 TO DETERMINE WHETHER IT IS A 'STRING'     00776021
                                     313 * OR 'OTHER THAN A STRING'. PUTS 1ST 4 BYTES IN 'HEADER'.               00784021
                                     314 * I. IF THE INPUT IS A 'STRING' -                                       00792021
                                     315 *    A. THE STRING HEADER (A 3 BYTE FIELD) IS STORED IN 'HEADER'.       00800021
                                     316 *       'HEADER+1' IS CALLED 'ANALNO' (ANALYZER NUMBER).                00808021
                                     317 *       'HEADER+2' IS CALLED 'ELEMCT' (ELEMENT COUNT).                  00816021
                                     318 *    B. THE ELEMENTS IN THE STRING ARE PUT IN 'ELEMTB' (ELEMENT TAB     00824021
                                     319 *    C. AFTER ALL ELEMENTS IN A STRING HAVE BEEN STORED IN 'ELEMTB'     00832021
                                     320 *       CONTROL PASSES TO A STRING ANALYZER.                            00840021
                                     321 *    D. AFTER AN ANALYZER HAS PROCESSED THE ELEMENT TABLE CONTROL I     00848021
                                     322 *          RETURNED TO PH5CTL                                           00856021
                                     323 * II. IF THE INPUT IS 'OTHER THAN A STRING' -                           00864021
                                     324 *    A. IF THE INPUT IS A SECTION OR PARAGRAPH NAME IT IS WRITTEN O     00872021
                                     325 *       AND CONTROL IS RETURNED TO 'SEARCH'. (INPUT IS IN 'HEADER')     00880021
                                     326 *    B. IF THE INPUT IS 'EOF' A DUMP IS TAKEN AND PROCESSING IS END     00888021
                                     327 *    C. II(A) AND II(B) WILL BE SPECIFIED IN MORE DETAIL LATER.         00896021
                                     328 *******************************************************************     00904021
                                     329 *******************************************************************     00912021
                                     330 *                                                                       00920021
                                     331 *                                                                       00928021
                                     332 *                                                                       00936021
                                     333 *                                                                       00944021
1         IKFCBL50: PH5CTL - PHASE 50 CONTROL ROUTINE                                                           PAGE   10
-  LOC  OBJECT CODE    ADDR1 ADDR2  STMT   SOURCE STATEMENT                                       ASM 0201 11.03 02/14/15
000000A                              335 PH5CTL   DS    0H                                                       00960021
 00000A 9200 D67C      08744         336          MVI   CDNOSW,XX00                                              00968021
 00000E 45E0 70E8      000E8         337        BAL   RETRG,GETNXT    *LOCATE NEXT ELEMENT TO BE PROCESSED       00976021
 000012 D200 D678 2000 08740 00000   338          MVC   ASRLAS(LX1),DX0(RW2)    FOR AUTOMATIC STOP RUN           00984021
 000018 9584 2000      00000         339          CLI   DX0(RW2),XX84   TEST IF ELEMENT IS STRING HEADER         00992021
 00001C 4770 70BC      000BC         340          BNE   CTLCPY                  NO                               01000021

0001690                             2604 IKF503 CSECT                                                            19112021
                             01690  2605 COMON3 EQU     *                                                        19120021
                                    2606 *                                                                       19128021
                                    2607 *=1      A TEXT GENERATOR                                               19136021
                                    2608 *******************************************************************     19144021
                                    2609 *                                                                       19152021
                                    2610 *        A TEXT GENERATOR                                               19160021
                                    2611 *                                                                       19168021
                                    2612 *******************************************************************     19176021
                                    2613 *        THE A TEXT GENERATOR IS USED BY THE DIFFERENT ANALYZERS        19184021
                                    2614 *                                                                       19192021
                                    2615 *        THERE ARE VARIOUS ENTRY POINTS TO THE A TEXT GENERATOR         19200021
                                    2616 *                                                                       19208021
                                    2617 *        THE ENTRY POINT TO BE USED IS DETERMINED BY THE                19216021
                                    2618 *        OBJECT INSTRUCTION DESIRED                                     19224021
                                    2619 *                                                                       19232021
                                    2620 *        THE LINKAGE TO THE A TEXT GENERATOR IS                         19240021
                                    2621 *           BAL  RETRG,THE PARTICULAR ENTRY POINT                       19248021
                                    2622 *                                                                       19256021
                                    2623 *   THE FOLLOWING WILL DESCRIBE HOW THE WORK AREAS ARE TO BE USED       19264021
                                    2624 *                                                                       19272021
                                    2625 *        XL1 AND XL2 ARE NEEDED FOR SS TYPE INSTRUCTIONS                19280021
                                    2626 *             IF THERE IS ONLY ONE LENGTH PUT IN XL1                    19288021
                                    2627 *                                                                       19296021
                                    2628 *        XWC1 AND XWC2 ARE EACH TWO BYTES LONG                          19304021
                                    2629 *   IF WE ARE IN A BINARY MODE THE LENGTH IS PUT IN A THIRD BYTE        19312021
                                    2630 *                                                                       19320021
                                    2631 *        THE FOLLOWING ELEMENTS EACH HAVE TWO DATA AREAS                19328021
                                    2632 *        XWC,BDISP,TALLY,XGN,XPN,XCON                                   19336021
                                    2633 *             DATA AREA 1 IS USED IF IT IS THE FIRST ADDRESS OPERAN     19344021
                                    2634 *             DATA AREA 2 IS USED IF IT IS THE SECND ADDRESS OPERAN     19352021
                                    2635 *                                                                       19360021
                                    2636 *          FOR DATA NAMES,ALL LITERALS,FIG CONS  POINTERS ARE USED      19368021
                                    2637 *             THE POINTERS ARE PUT IN OP1,OP2 AS THEY ARE NEEDED        19376021
                                    2638 *                                                                       19384021
                                    2639 *******************************************************************     19392021
                                    2640 *******************************************************************     19400021
 001690 9218 D1DD      082A5        2641 LOAD     MVI   OPCOD,XX18     LR OP CODE =18   CHANGED IF L OR LH OR    19408021
 001694 900F D0E0      081A8        2642 GHIBYT STM   GR1,GR15,GSVRG                                             19416021

                                    4621 *                                                                       35248021
                                    4622 *  GENERATE CALL TO FPOWER.                                             35256021
                                    4623 *                                                                       35264021
                                    4624 *        LD   0,BASE                                                    35272021
                                    4625 *        MVC  WORKA+8(8,13),EXPONENT                                    35280021
                                    4626 *        L    15,V(FPOWER)                                              35288021
                                    4627 *        BALR 14,15                                                     35296021
                                    4628 *  RESULT IN  REGISTER 0.                                               35304021
                                    4629 *                                                                       35312021
                                    4630 *      IF EXPONENT IS KNOWN TO BE AN INTEGER AT COMPILE TIME A CALL     35320021
                                    4631 *      TO GPOWER WILL BE GENERATED UNLESS IT IS A LITERAL INTEGER,      35328021
                                    4632 *      IN WHICH CASE AN IN LINE LOOP WILL BE GENERATED.                 35336021
                                    4633 *                                                                       35344021
                                    4634 *  CALLING SEQUENCE TO GPOWER IS                                        35352021
                                    4635 *        LD  0,BASE                                                     35360021
                                    4636 *        L   0,EXPONENT                                                 35368021
                                    4637 *        L   15,=V(GPOWER)                                              35376021
                                    4638 *        BALR 14,15                                                     35384021
                                    4639 *                                                                       35392021
                                    4640 *  THE IN-LINE LOOP WILL BE                                             35400021
                                    4641 *        LD  RF1,BASE                                                   35408021
                                    4642 *        L   R1,EXPONT-1                                                35416021
                                    4643 *        LDR RF2,RF1                                                    35424021
                                    4644 *   5GN  MDR RF1,RF2                                                    35432021

                                   11299 * DIRECT A-TEXT WRITE OUT STRINGS REQUIRING CHANGES. THOSE STRINGS      88680021
                                   11300 *   NOT REQUIRING CHANGES ARE IN THE CONSTANT AREA                      88688021
                                   11301 *                                                                       88696021
                                   11302 *   TO ADD NEW DIRECT A-TEXT STRINGS, USE THE NEXT HIGHEST NUMBER,      88704021
                                   11303 *            BEYOND THE HIGHEST PREVIOUS NUMBER USED, =MM.              88712021
                                   11304 *      A)    SET UP TEXT IN THE... CONSTANT AREA IF NO BYTE IS CHAN     88720021
                                   11305 *                              ... DATA AREA IF ONE OR MORE BYTES C     88728021
                                   11306 *            FORMAT...                                                  88736021

                                   11309 *            ZTXTNN  EQU  *                                             88760021

                                   11311 *      B)    THE CALLING SEQUENCE IS...                                 88776021

                                   11313 *                                  DC   AL2(ATXTNN-ATXTBC) (OR, GAT     88792021
